attributes.action: oppose the British Olympic Associations attempts to create a 'British' football team to take part in the 2012 Olympics in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned call on our government to oppose the fielding of a 'British' football team in the 2012 Olympics on the grounds that it will undermine the great National teams already present and could be the first step towards a unification into a single British International side destroying the great histories of our International teams.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "oppose the British Olympic Associations attempts to create a 'British' football team to take part in the 2012 Olympics in London."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17709


Prime Minister's Office
